idea-plugin.name: ${plugin.name}
idea-plugin.description: Integration with VisualVM's profiler (the same as NetBeans Profiler).
idea-plugin.change-notes:
0.1.0 (2008-xx-xx)
- Initial release
- CPU profiling (Windows Java 6 only)

Known issues
- Hardcoded profiler interface: jdk16 windows
- Memory profiling is not available
- Settings are not copied to VisualVM's user interface
- Bundled VisualVM is not detected from available JDKs
- No button for opening the currently running (non-profiled) program in VisualVM
- Detecting the launched application from within VisualVM is not 100% sure
